reviewText:
Mary is the best!  My kids loved this video when they were young and they still do, and they are not young anymore (25 & 32)!
This is a GREAT fun sing a long for kids of all ages, and for adults to surprise their kids with at bday parties to make them laugh as well :)
I can't believe I found a VHS tape of this.  My daughter is loving this.  They don't care how it looks or how old it is, kids just love these timeless songs

Mary Rice Hopkins writes and sings the most amazing songs.  My grandchildren have been mesmerized by her videos since they were 6 months old and still are at 6 years old.  They like to move their bodies right along with the other children on the videos.  These videos are so great we adults love them too.  Very heartwarming!

This is an old video but is still so dear to me and all the kids who watch it. They can sing and dance to happy songs that teach lessons. A good video for young children when you need something for them to do that is good for them.
THIS WAS ONE OF THE BEST PURCHASED ITEMS I HAVE MADE FOR MY CHILDREN. IT ARRIVED FAST! AND THEY HAVE BEEN PLAYING IT EVER SINCE.

My whole family is a fan of Mary Rice Hopkins.  My twins at 20 months are already starting to do the hand motions along with the video.  The songs are lively, fun, and meaningful.  I find myself singing them throughout the day.  Try this one, you will like it!

Mary Rice Hopkins has a wonderful way with children.  She's "real" and communicates on their level without being sticky sweet,which is wonderful for the adults who will be hearing this tape again  and again. She provides interactive songs that will keep your children  captivated and you humming the songs all day long. Everybody wins!
